import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { postConfiguration } from '../../actions/FetchAction'; import idbuzzconfig from '../../img/IDBuzz-config-Mittel.jpeg'; import Header from '../Header'; const SummaryView = () => { const currentConfig = useSelector(state => state.config); console.log(currentConfig) const germanDescription = ["Motor", "Außenfarbe", "Interieur", "Räder/Reifen", "Extras"] const attributes = [currentConfig.engine, currentConfig.color, currentConfig.interior, currentConfig.wheels, currentConfig.extras] const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
Zusammenfassung ID. Buzz

ID. Buzz Pro KR 150 kW 77 kWh 1-Gang-Automatik; Strom; Kraftstoffverbrauch kombiniert: 18,9 kWh/100 km ⁠1 und CO₂-Emission kombiniert: 0 g/km ⁠1; Effizienzklasse: A+++ ⁠ 2; Kann auswählbare Optionen enthalten

{germanDescription.map((step, i) =>
{`${i + 1}. ${step}`} {attributes[i] ?
{attributes[i].title}
{attributes[i].thumbnailUrl ?
: ""}
Preis inkl. MwSt. {attributes[i].priceInCents / 100}€
: ""}
)}
) } export default SummaryView;
